resources.string: Play a game within this app. You can play a single player game, or share your device with another person to play local multiplayer. Network multiplayer will not be available. If you want to play with someone else who is hosting a server, you must get a link to their server from them, and play in a browser.

Host a web server on this device. Then you and others on your local wifi network (if IP isolation isn\'t enabled) can play together by opening a URL in your browser. The URL will be generated on the next page.
Choose to either play the web version (embedded within an Android webview), or the experimental Android implementation.
Share the below link with your friends on your local network, or open it yourself in a browser.

**NOTE** that it will likely only work if both you and them are on the same home network (e.g. wifi). Some public wifi networks do not allow devices to communicate with each other directly. Technically you could enable port forwarding on your home router and then give them your public IP address, but this is probably not a good idea. To play with someone on a different network, please visit the public site at https://alexbarry.net/games
